title: League wont open after it updated client
body: I have been trying to open the client since it updated to the new one and it just wont open. I don't know what else to do to fix it. Anybody has the same problem or have a solution? i have already uninstalled and reinstalled and it didnt work.

replies.body: Uuuuuugh Windows just doesn't like people having fun sometimes. Your OS might not recognize the new client and is shutting it down before it can launch just in case it's malicious. We can get this ironed out pretty easily by making sure you have all the right [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) set up. Hit me back if you still can't seem to get back in the game though!
